quote_first: I'll compromise by saying that I left home at eight and spent an hour travelling to a nine o'clock appointment. Twenty minutes later is
title: Girl, Interrupted
author: Susanna Kaysen

quote_last: , the Duke of Dunstable, who had dined off a tray in his room, was still there, waiting for his coffee and liqueur.
title: Uncle Fred in the Springtime
author: P.G. Wodehouse

quote_last: Mr Cribbage straightened his greasy old tie, combed his Hitler moustache and arranged the few strands of his hair across his bald patch.
title: Red Dog
author: Louis de Bernieres
